text.div:
CARIN RTPBC Billing Units Code System

This code system defines the quantity units of measure to be used when requesting predetermination of benefits for prescription-related products.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/CodeSystem/rtpbc-billing-units defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
GM GramQuantity unit of measure for products billed as a number of grams
ML MilliliterQuantity unit of measure for products billed as a number of milliliters
EA EachQuantity unit of measure for products billed as individual items (e.g., tablets)

name: CarinRtpbcBillingUnitsCodeSystem
